## RemoteChangeEvent interface

`RemoteChangeEvent` is an event that occurs when the document is changed by remote changes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare interface RemoteChangeEvent<T = OperationInfo, P extends Indexable = Indexable> 
```
